meta.name: Automated SEO Watchlist: Continuous Audits with Decodo, Gemini & Google Sheets

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "url": "string",
  "fetched_at": "ISO8601",
  "status": 200,
  "final_url": "string",
  "summary": {
    "page_type": "string",
    "language": "string",
    "primary_keyword": "string|null",
    "overall_score": 0.0
  },
  "checks": [
    {
      "id": "title",
      "status": "pass|warn|fail",
      "score": 0.0,       
      "details": "short string",
      "evidence": ["title tag value", "..."],
      "confidence": 0.0  
    }
  ],
  "issues": [
    {
      "id": "missing_meta_description",
      "severity": "critical|high|medium|low",
      "message": "short string",
      "location": "head|body|headers|http",
      "examples": ["example fix snippet or replacement string"],
      "priority": 1,
      "estimated_impact": "high|medium|low",
      "confidence": 0.0
    }
  ],
  "recommendations": [
    {
      "id": "fix_title",
      "severity": "high",
      "instruction": "copyable instruction or code snippet",
      "priority": 1,
      "estimated_time_minutes": 15,
      "confidence": 0.85
    }
  ],
  "metrics": {
    "content_word_count": 0,
    "h1_count": 0,
    "image_count": 0,
    "images_missing_alt": 0,
    "internal_links": 0,
    "external_links": 0,
    "word_density": [{"term":"x","count":0,"density":0.0}],
    "lighthouse": {"performance":0,"accessibility":0,"seo":0,"best_practices":0}
  }
}

messageValues.message:
=# Role
* act as an SEO expert

# Instructions
- Analyze the page, Return JSON based on schema, No explanation or extra text — only JSON
- This is very important tasks, analyze carefully

# CHECKS TO ANALYZE:
* Metadata quality and duplication
* Content length vs top 3 competitors (approx)
* H1/H2 structure and keyword signaling
* Schema.org types and common error
* Page speed & CWV flags (LCP>2.5s, CLS>0.1, INP>200ms)
* Mobile friendly
* Images alt presence and size
* Internal linking count and broken link detection (only flag if obvious)
* Canonical alignment (canonical should point to final_url)
* Noindex or X-Robots headers

# SCORING:
Use weights: 
* metadata 15
* content 25
* perf 20
* index 15
* links 10
* schema 5
* Provide `overall_score` 0..100.

parameters.content:
## ✅ Loop Over Items

Takes each URL one-by-one and processes them separately. This keeps the workflow stable and organized.

## ✅ Decodo

Fetches live data from the website (title, content, tags, speed signals, etc.) so it can be analyzed.

## ✅ SEO Analyzer

Uses AI to review the website and create an SEO report based on scoring rules (content, metadata, links, speed, etc.).

## ✅ Structured Output Parser

Makes sure the AI’s answer comes back as clean, valid JSON. This prevents messy or unexpected text.

## Notify Team (Telegram)

Sends a Telegram message telling the team the analysis is complete and results are in the sheet.

## Store Result (Google Sheets)

Adds a new row to the results sheet with the report for that URL, so results are saved historically.

# Automated SEO Watchlist: Continuous Audits Powered by Decodo

## ✅ What this workflow does
It automatically audits website pages for SEO issues, stores results in Google Sheets, and notifies the team — completely hands-free.

## ✅ How it works
- The workflow starts every 5 days on its own.
- It reads a list of page URLs from Google Sheets.
- Each page is processed one at a time for reliability.
- Decodo — the main tech of this system — collects real content, tags, headings, speed signals, and more from each page.
- AI analyzes the data using SEO best practices and creates a structured score/report.
- Results are turned into short, human-friendly summaries.
- A new entry is added to Google Sheets for tracking over time.
- A Telegram message alerts the team when fresh results are ready.

## ✅ Why Decodo matters
Decodo powers the entire audit — it pulls real, live page data so the AI can accurately judge SEO health.
Without Decodo, there’s nothing to analyze.

## ✅ What you get
- Automatic SEO auditing
- Clear next steps and recommendations
- Historical results stored as a log
- No manual checking or reporting

## ✅ Great for
Marketing teams, agencies, product sites, blogs, or anyone who wants continuous SEO monitoring with zero effort.

## Mapping Result (Code)

Turns the JSON report into short, readable summaries (checks, issues, recommendations) and prepares them for Sheets.
